Kentwood Homes

Our Story

Kentwood is a group of forward-building custom builders based in Richmond, Vancouver. Multi-award winning, we specialize in high-quality architectural design with a Focus on craft, efficiency, and aesthetics.

Each home is designed with high standards of design and durability, using modern energy-efficient materials and appliances to reduce environmental impact and lower utility costs. We are committed to providing our homeowners with a house they can be proud of, with a focus on quality, value, and customer satisfaction.

Why Our Homes Stand Above The Rest

On Time, On Budget, On Vision

Building your home is a big commitment and requires trust, which is why we value open communication and transparency. Our team manages every project with a focused attention to detail, ensuring that our client's expectations are not just met, but exceeded.

Innovative Approach, Stronger Builds

Our process connects you with the best industry professionals from the beginning, ensuring every home we build stands as a testament to craftsmanship and forward-thinking design. We utilize cutting-edge technology and materials to ensure longevity and efficiency.

Sustainable Design, Innovative Methods

We believe that a better future starts with sustainable building methods and technologies. From energy-efficient insulation to solar-ready designs, our multiplex homes are built with both your comfort and the planet in mind.

The Kentwood Approach

01

Planning & Acquisition

We start by identifying the right locations for our multiplex developments, focusing on areas with strong growth potential and community amenities.

02

Design

Our design team works closely with leading architects to create homes that are as beautiful as they are functional.

03

Building & Development

Our experienced construction team ensures that every build meets our high standards for quality and craftsmanship.

04

Post Development Care

Our commitment to our homeowners doesn't end with a sale. We provide comprehensive after-care and support.

Building high-quality, sustainable communities that harmonize with their surroundings.
